content.text:
## Google Ads Campaigns

Here are all active Google Ads campaigns across the platform:

| Campaign ID | Brand | Budget | Spend | Pacing | Health | Impressions | Clicks | CTR | CPA | Quality Score |
|-------------|-------|--------|-------|--------|--------|-------------|--------|-----|-----|---------------|
| mb_gads_apex_motors | Apex Motors | $60,000 | $38,750 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 4.25M | 89.2K | 2.1% | $124.20 | 7.2 |
| mb_gads_techflow | TechFlow SaaS | $40,000 | $24,800 | Behind | ‚ö†Ô∏è Warning | 3.18M | 42.9K | 1.35% | $133.33 | 5.1 |
| mb_gads_financefirst | FinanceFirst Bank | $50,000 | $31,200 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 5.64M | 98.7K | 1.75% | $73.81 | 7.8 |
| mb_gads_freshbite | FreshBite Foods | $25,000 | $11,400 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 1.52M | 18.2K | 1.2% | $120.00 | N/A |
| mb_gads_urbanliving | UrbanLiving Real Estate | $35,000 | $19,600 | On Track | ‚úÖ Good | 3.85M | 57.8K | 1.5% | $73.41 | 7.5 |

### Key Highlights:

**üéØ Best Performers:**
- **FinanceFirst Bank**: Lowest CPA at $73.81, highest quality score (7.8), and strong 6.2% search CTR on branded terms
- **Apex Motors**: Highest engagement with 2.1% CTR and strong desktop performance (2.64% CTR)

**‚ö†Ô∏è Needs Attention:**
- **TechFlow SaaS**: Currently behind pacing with critical keyword quality issues
  - Broad match keywords consuming 40% of budget ($9,920) but only delivering 15% of conversions at $354 CPA
  - Exact match keywords performing excellently at $68.50 CPA vs broad match at $354.29
  - **Recommendation**: Pause broad match keywords and reallocate to exact/phrase match

**üí° Platform-Specific Insights:**
- **YouTube Performance**: FreshBite Foods has strong 26% view rate (above 20% benchmark)
- **Search Impression Share**: Most campaigns losing 22-28% impression share to rank (bid opportunity)
- **Mobile vs Desktop**: Mobile generally performing well, especially for real estate and food verticals

Would you like me to dive deeper into any specific campaign or help optimize the TechFlow SaaS keyword strategy?
